basics.name: Ardian Cakolli
basics.label: Software Developer
basics.summary: I am Ardian Cakolli, a highly motivated computer sciences engineer, software and web application developer. I like to build web applications, a job I've been doing for some time now. My main strengths are my problem-solving approach, my willingness to learn more and my ability to work hard and under pressure in time-sensitive situations. In addition, I am organized and detail-oriented. Currently, I am learning a little bit of functional programming.

work.summary: Lead architect and developer on a project-based invoice application. Technologies used in this project are Laravel 5.3 and VueJs/Vuex. The project includes different invoicing capabilities, reporting, and notifications among others. My latest projects for a client in the US is an application which processes Point of Sale (POS) data built with Laravel (API) and Angular 5.

A full stack developer directly involved in process of creating web pages and applications based on clientâ€™s needs. Programming languages and tools used during that time include PHP (WordPress, Laravel, Vagrant, Homestead, Lumen, CodeIgniter) for the backend, and frontend: JavaScript, jQuery, AngularJs.

A web developer for creating web templates and applications based on requirements from the clients, using open the following programming languages: PHP (WordPress), JavaScript (jQuery, Ajax), HTML5 & CSS3.
